Address.label: Address
Address.value: 800, 525 - 8 AVENUE, S.W,SUITE 4200, CALGARY, Alberta, T2P 1G1, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Precision Drilling Corp is a leader in North American oil and gas services. It is a provider of contract drilling and completion and production services primarily to oil and natural gas exploration and production companies in Canada. Its segments are Contract Drilling Services which is the majority key revenue generator and other segments include Completion and Production Services.
